snippet: A 24-year-old Los Angeles man was charged Monday with attempted murder after a homeless woman was set on fire last week as she slept on a suburban bus bench.
abstract: Los Angeles man Dennis Petillo is charged with attempted murder after a homeless woman was set on fire as she slept on suburban bus bench.
lead_paragraph: A 24-year-old Los Angeles man was charged Monday with attempted murder after a homeless woman was set on fire last week as she slept on a suburban bus bench.

headline.seo: California Man Held in Burning of Homeless Woman
headline.main: California: Man Held in Burning of Homeless Woman
headline.print_headline: California: Man Held In Burning of Homeless Woman
